rand.cpp File Reference

Detailed Description

Implementation of the random number functions, uses the Mersenne Twister pseudo-random number generator implementation (http://www.bedaux.net/mtrand/) from the paper: M. Matsumoto and T. Nishimura, Mersenne Twister: A 623-Dimensionally Equidistributed Uniform Pseudo-Random Number Generator, ACM Transactions on Modeling and Computer Simulation, Vol. 8, No. 1, January 1998, pp. 3-30

Date:
Oct 14th, 2009 last edited: Oct 14th, 2009
Author:
Michael Sneddon

#include "MTrand/mtrand.h"
#include "rand.hh"
#include <time.h>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <math.h>
